browser-action.name: Type on Last Name
browser-action.description:
Type some text inside an element.
Possible parameters are: - selector (required): The selector is a string that point to the elements in the page. Several types of selector are supported: Text, CSS, XPath... - text (optional): Text to type - encryptedText (optional): Text to type on a password input. - timeout (optional): Forces the timeout for that action in ms. - mode (optional): TYPE or FILL. Type is more realist, types keys one by one. Fill sends the whole string in one go. Default to TYPE. - delay (optional): Adds delay between each keydown/keyup sequence in ms. Used only when mode TYPE is selected. Default to 100 - frameName (optional): Frame name
